alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN PASSAIC AND ORANGE COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Monticello to Millrift to near Stormville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, Middletown, West Milford, Ringwood, Port Jervis, Monroe, Walden, West Point, Warwick, Goshen, Howells, New Windsor, Gardnertown, Chester, and Montgomery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.
